function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spillover effects of variables on COVID-19 infections and deaths.","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread of COVID-19 due to indirect effects.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted measures to address indirect spillover effects. Improve data collection to capture spillover effects accurately.","Technologies":"Spatial econometric models, data analysis tools for capturing indirect effects.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations in nursing homes, school children, and childcare attendees.","Owner":"Health authorities, researchers, policymakers, data analysts."},{"Description":"Use of spatial econometric models to capture indirect spillover effects.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the impact of socio-economic variables on COVID-19 infections and deaths.","Mitigation":"Validation of spatial econometric models with real-world data. Continuous refinement of the models based on new insights and data.","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis tools, data validation and verification tools.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, policymakers, public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams, public health agencies."}]}
